author: Bradley Hope
title: Quants Embrace Recent Selloff Even as Everyone Blames Them For It
text:
A day after the stock market plummeted more than 1,100 points, quantitative traders were made the scapegoat by many investors and even the treasury secretary.
But within these high-powered “quant” funds, few see themselves as the problem. Some are even saying the selloff presents their best opportunity in a few years to make money for their investors.
